bike.description: FACT M10 carbon front triangle, Az1 construction, M5 aluminum rear triangle, 100mm travel, FACT carbon link

components.description: Specialized AFR Shock w/ Flow Control valve, adjustable from HT firm to Trail Tune, air spring, adjustable rebound
1 1/8" threadless, integrated alloy cups, sealed cartridge bearing

34.9mm clamp, dual bolt for carbon frame/post
